title: Summer Campaign KV
description: Key visual design for a summer ad campaign featuring vibrant colors and dynamic typography. This project involved creating compelling visual narratives that capture the essence of summer energy and translate brand values into memorable imagery.

title: Brand Identity Redesign
description: Complete rebrand for a fashion startup including logo design, color palette, typography system, and brand guidelines. The project focused on creating a modern, sophisticated identity that appeals to young professionals.

title: Telecom TVC
description: 30-second commercial for telecom provider showcasing their new 5G network capabilities. The commercial features dynamic motion graphics and compelling storytelling to highlight speed and connectivity.

title: Animated Promo
description: Motion graphics explainer for fintech app launch. Created engaging animations that simplify complex financial concepts and guide users through the app's key features and benefits.

title: 3D Product Render
description: High-quality 3D render of a consumer product for e-commerce and marketing materials. Photorealistic rendering with attention to materials, lighting, and composition to showcase product features.

title: Pitch Deck Design
description: Investor pitch deck for startup funding featuring clean design, compelling data visualization, and strategic storytelling. Designed to communicate complex business concepts clearly and persuasively.

title: Tech Conference KV
description: Key visual campaign for annual technology conference. Modern, futuristic design approach with bold typography and geometric elements to convey innovation and forward-thinking.

title: Restaurant Branding
description: Complete brand identity for upscale restaurant including logo, menu design, signage, and packaging. Elegant design that reflects the restaurant's premium positioning and culinary excellence.

title: Car Commercial
description: Luxury car commercial emphasizing performance and elegance. Cinematic approach with dramatic lighting and smooth camera movements to showcase the vehicle's design and capabilities.

title: App Launch Animation
description: Launch animation sequence for mobile app featuring smooth transitions and micro-interactions. Designed to create excitement and demonstrate the app's user-friendly interface.

title: Architectural Visualization
description: 3D architectural visualization for residential development. Photorealistic renders showcasing interior and exterior spaces with accurate lighting and materials to help clients visualize the final result.

title: Corporate Presentation
description: Annual report presentation for Fortune 500 company. Professional design with consistent branding, clear data visualization, and engaging layouts to communicate company performance and strategy.
